title: high bronze/low silver team
body: looking for a team/group of high bronze/silver players who can help me improve b1 currently cant get out of the low elo hell

replies.body:
HI, Im also stuck in bronze fml...

I main sup and mid and play regularly. 

IGN: RE44PR and also have discord.

currently B2, top/jungle main but can play mid. I avoid playing anything botlane but if needed can do. 
Will be going on a 1 month holiday in 10 days so be aware
IGN: macro

Hey, I'd be willing to join. I just hit silver 5 and can play pretty regularly, especially with the upcoming school holidays. 

I main jg mostly, but can also play ADC and top well.

My ign is: Miicka
